bP_Synch.description: Search Remote DBs for Profile records. Refresh local DB if necessary

disabledFeeds.description: Available feeds that have been disabled

synthesise.description: Perform Synthesis on the highlighted selection

omniboxUsage.message:
Usage
	 string : 
		<meo String> synthesise 'String' (case preserved)
		<meo   a String  > synthesise 'a String' (leading, trailing white-space stripped)
	valid JSON :
		<meo {'oos' : '  a String '}> synthesise '  a String ' (leading, trailing white-space preserved)
		<meo {'X' : {'oos' : 'two'}, 'Y' : {'oos' : 'Strings'}}> - synthesise 'two', synthesise 'Strings', Meiosis (1♥2)
		<meo {'X' : {'X' : {'oos' : '3'}, 'Y' : {'oos' : 'three'}}, 'Y' : {'X' : {'oos' : 'Strings'}}}> - synthesise '3', synthesise 'three',  Meiosis (1♥2), synthesise 'Strings', MateSelect (3), Meiosis (3♥4),  Meiosis
